title: Another gift idea for this year
content: Well, Google isn't my friend today because I can't find the thread this really belongs. But, if you have a designer or typographer in your life that loves posters you might consider International Poster. They have prices that are somewhat affordable and could certainly be considered an investment. [Gifts from $20 to $200](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020172714/http:/www.internationalposter.com/search-results.aspx?defaultview=browse&price=low&title=Under%20$250). They also have a nice little [selection of books](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020172714/http:/www.internationalposter.com/reference-books/general-books-on-posters.aspx) in regards to the topic!
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content: Hey! That's the place down on Newbury St.! They're great.

"Well, Google isn’t my friend today because I can’t find the thread this really belongs"

Is this the one?

Those posters look lovely!
